scripts.preinstall: if [ ! -x "$(opam config var graphql_ppx:bin)/graphql_ppx.native" ]; then echo 'You must install graphql_ppx through opam before using this package. Run `opam install graphql_ppx`'; fi
scripts.postinstall: if [ ! -f ./ppx ]; then ln -s "$(opam config var graphql_ppx:bin)/graphql_ppx.native" ./ppx && chmod +x ppx; fi
